summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of CRM system. All backend APIs (26/26 tests) passed successfully. Frontend testing confirmed all major features are working: login, dashboard statistics, customer management with CRUD operations, vehicle management with accordion in customer details, employee management with age/service years calculation, task management, user management (admin only), and navigation between all pages.
passed_tests: Backend: Login authentication (admin credentials)
Backend: Get current user info
Backend: Customer CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Backend: Vehicle CRUD operations with customer filtering
Backend: Employee CRUD operations
Backend: Task CRUD operations with status updates
Backend: User management (admin only)
Frontend: Login functionality with admin account
Frontend: Dashboard loads and displays statistics (2 customers, 1 vehicle, 1 employee, 1 open task)
Frontend: Customer creation with all required fields
Frontend: Customer search functionality
Frontend: Customer details page navigation
Frontend: Customer edit functionality
Frontend: Vehicle addition to customer in customer details page
Frontend: Vehicle accordion display and expansion in customer details
Frontend: Separate vehicles menu page
Frontend: Employee creation with all fields
Frontend: Employee age calculation (displays 'Alter: 35 Jahre')
Frontend: Employee service years calculation (displays 'Dienstjahre: 10 Jahre')
Frontend: Task creation with customer and employee assignment
Frontend: Task status change to 'erledigt'
Frontend: User management page (admin access)
Frontend: New user creation (admin only)
Frontend: Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Kunden, Fahrzeuge, Mitarbeiter, Aufgaben, Benutzer)
